title: A proclamation anent recruits, levies, deserters and passes
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
publisher: printed by the heirs and successors of Andrew Anderson, printer to the Kings most excellent Majest[ies],
notes: Dated at end: Edinburgh, the thirteenth day of February, and of Our Reign the seventh year, 1696.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C..
